algorithm_technique: Integer division and multiplication to simulate rounding to the nearest multiple of 10.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the remaining balance after a purchase is rounded to the nearest $10.
problem_summary_technical: Applies a mathematical formula using integer division to round the purchase amount up to the nearest multiple of 10.
key_insights: The rounding rule (5 rounds up) can be implemented with `(x + 5) // 10 * 10`.
The problem involves a simple arithmetic calculation, making it a constant time operation.
